price: 24. Tada [kūdikis Isa (Jėzus) arba Džibrylis (Gabrielius)] sušuko jai iš po jos, sakydamas: „Nesielvartauk, tavo Viešpats suteikė vandens srovę po tavimi.“
arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fanādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad jaʿala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyan
